attributes.action: Remove the Board of Directors of NS&I
attributes.additional_details: Google the terms "NS&I and scandal" or "NS&I problems" and you will see numerous articles from all the national newspapers listing customer complaints. Google Trustpilot & NS&I
attributes.background: Replace the civil service management of NS&I with competent experienced bankers who recognise that the ablility to withdraw funds easily and promptly goes to the very heart of a trusted banking system.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours and appointments, including petitions that make requests relating to the directors of non-ministerial departments.
